short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Temporary disposable email address. Protect your email from unwanted spam, bots and phishing with LuxusMail.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Disposable, throw away email helps keep you safe from spam and other malicious activity, all while keeping your inbox clean.

LuxusMail is a free temp mail service that provides you with free disposable email address that can be used to register on the services and websites that you wish not use your own primary email address.
 
So, if are looking for an efficient way to keep your mailbox secure from spammers, endless advertising newsletters, and attacking robots, use LuxusMail for free and create as many disposable email addresses as you need.
